exclusion:
1. Power on the device.
  2. Put the Primary Controller into exclusion mode (If you don’t know how to do this refer to its manual)
  3. Tap the action button once, when the purple LED is on it indicates the device has entered unpair mode.
  4. If exclusion was successful, the blue LED will blink slowly.
inclusion:
1. Power on the device, the LED will blink blue slowly.
  2. Put the Primary Controller into inclusion mode (If you don’t know how to do this, refer to its manual)
  3. Tap the action button once, when the yellow LED is on it indicates the device has entered pair mode.
  4. If inclusion was successful, the power LED  will flash (white -> green -> white -> green at a rate of 250ms for each colour) for 2 seconds
label: ZWA024
overview: Aeotec MultiSensor 7 was developed to detect ambient values and movement and to transmit them with Z-Wave Plus. It is powered by Aeotec’s Gen7 technology.
usage: Factory Reset - Press and hold the action button for 20+ seconds, LED will fade in and out blue for 2 seconds when reset.
wakeup:
Quick Wakeup - Press and hold the action button for 2-5 seconds. LED will go solid red.

Long Wakeup -Press and hold the action button for 5-9 seconds. LED will go solid orange. Mode will remain active and LED will remain on for 5 mins max.

parameters.label: Beaming Mode
parameters.overview: Used to enable/disable beaming. If set to 1, FLiR commands will be supported and device type will be LSS. But the device must be re-included into the network to activate it.

parameters.label: Motion Retrigger Time
parameters.overview:
Presence re-detection time set in second to allow motion sensor to reset timeout of motion sensor. In this time, the motion sensor can not be triggered again. If this value reach zero, the timeout configuration value set by Parameter 3 will be reset.

0 – disable

1~30 - 30 seconds

30 ~ 3600 - timeout set in seconds

parameters.label: Motion Untrigger Time
parameters.overview: Timeout configuration set in second for motion sensor to send no trigger status.

parameters.label: Motion Sensitivity
parameters.overview:
Set the sensitivity of motion sensor.

0 - disable

1 - minimum sensitivity

11 - maximum sensitivity

parameters.label: Motion Report Type
parameters.overview:
Set which command class will be sent when motion sensor is triggered or detriggered.

0 - Sends Notification Report

1 - Sends Sensor Binary Report

2 - Sends Notification and Sensor Binary Report

parameters.label: Vibration Sensor Enable/Disable
parameters.overview:
Used to enable/disable vibration sensor.

0 - disable vibration

1~254 - timeout set in minutes to reset vibration status

255 - only send vibration triggered, does not timeout

parameters.label: Vibration Intensity Reports
parameters.overview:
Used to enable/disable vibration intensity reports. If set to 1, vibration intensity will be sent to gateway when

triggered. If set to 0, do not report.

parameters.label: Wakeup CC Timeout
parameters.overview:
Timeout set in seconds after Wakeup CC is send out before go to sleep. If role type is RSS, the minimum value will

be 10. If role type is LSS, the minimum value will be 2. If wakeup no more information received, return to sleep

mode immediately.

parameters.label: Power Status
parameters.overview:
This value is Readonly. Used to report the power status (USB or Battery powered)

0 - When battery powered, the device will act as RSS.

1 - When USB cable insert, the device will act as AOS.

The device must be re-included in the network to change the role type.

parameters.label: Motion Group Control (Group2)
parameters.overview:
Set control of other devices on group2 based on motion trigger

0 - Send BASIC_SET (0xFF) when motion is triggered to associated device

Send BASIC_SET (0x00) when motion is untriggered to associated device

1 - Send BASIC_SET (0x00) when motion is triggered

Send BASIC_SET (0xFF) when motion is untriggered

2 - Send BASIC_SET (0xFF) when motion is triggered, Nothing when motion untriggered.

3 - Send BASIC_SET (0x00) when motion is triggered, Nothing when motion untriggered.

4 - Send BASIC_SET (0x00) when motion is untriggered, Nothing when motion triggered.

5 - Send BASIC_SET (0xFF) when motion is untriggered, Nothing when motion triggered.

6 - Send BASIC_SET (value is configured by parameter 12) when motion is triggered to associated devices.

Send BASIC_SET (value is configured by parameter 12) when motion is untriggered.

parameters.label: Motion Group Value Setting
parameters.overview:
Set Basic Set value for Group2. The MSB will act as the basic set value when motion trigger. The LSB will act as the

basic set value when motion untrigger. E.g. value=0x0A00, then BASIC_SET(0x0A) will be sent when motion trigger,

BASIC_SET(0x00) will be sent when motion untrigger.

parameters.label: Motion Group Control Requirement
parameters.overview:
Set threshold of Light/Lux when devices associated in group2 should be triggered by motion. Associated device only

receive BASIC_SET command when light <= (this value).

parameters.label: Over Humidity Group Threshold (Group5)
parameters.overview:
Set threshold of humidity. If measured humidity >= (this value), send BASIC_SET (0xFF) to associated devices

through group5. If measured humidity < (this value) send BASIC_SET (0x00) to associated devices through group5.

parameters.label: Under Humidity Group Threshold (Group6)
parameters.overview:
Set threshold of humidity. If measure humidity <= (this value) send BASIC_SET (0xFF) to associated devices through

group6. If measured humidity > (this value) send BASIC_SET (0x00) to associated devices through group6.

parameters.label: Over Heat Group Threshold (Group3)
parameters.overview:
Set threshold of temperature. Designed to control Air Conditioners or temperature controllers ON or OFF. If

measured temperature >= (this value, Scale is determined by Param64) send BASIC_SET (0xFF) to associated devices.

If measured temperature < (this value) send BASIC_SET (0x00) to associated devices. E.g. Value 239 means 23.9 C.

Value 750 means 75.0 F.

Value Range (EU/AU) : 400~850

Value Range (US) : 400~1850

Default Value  (EU/AU) : 239

Default Value (US) :750

parameters.label: Under Heat Group Threshold (Group4)
parameters.overview:
Set threshold of temperature. Designed to control Air Conditioners or temperature controllers ON or OFF. If

measured temperature <= (this value, Scale is determined by Param64) send BASIC_SET (0xFF) to associated devices.

If measured temperature > (this value) send BASIC_SET (0x00) to associated devices. E.g. Value 155 means 15.5 C.

Value 600 means 60.0 F.

Value Range (EU/AU) : 400~850

Value Range (US) : 400~1850

Default Value (EU/AU) : 155

Default Value (US) : 600

parameters.label: Over Light Group Threshold (Group7)
parameters.overview:
Set threshold of Light/Lux. If measured light/lux >= (this value) send BASIC_SET (0xFF) to associated devices. If

measured light/lux < (this value) send BASIC_SET (0x00) to associated devices.

parameters.label: Under Light Group Threshold (Group8)
parameters.overview:
Set threshold of Light/Lux. If measured light/lux <= (this value) send BASIC_SET (0xFF) to associated devices. If

measured light/lux > (this value) send BASIC_SET (0x00) to associated devices.

parameters.label: Over UV Group Threshold (Group9)
parameters.overview:
Set threshold of UV. If measured UV >= (this value) send BASIC_SET (0xFF) to associated devices. If measured UV <

(this value) send BASIC_SET (0x00) to associated devices.

parameters.label: Under UV Group Threshold (Group10)
parameters.overview:
Set threshold of UV. If measured UV <= (this value) send BASIC_SET (0xFF) to associated devices. If measured UV >

(this value) send BASIC_SET (0x00 to associated devices.)

parameters.label: Low Battery Threshold
parameters.overview:
Configure low battery report threshold, sends low battery report via notification and battery report when battery

level drops under setting. Unit %.

parameters.label: Threshold Check Enable/Disable
parameters.overview:
Enable/Disable threshold reporting, check time can be adjusted by Param45.

0 - disable all threshold reports

1 - enable all threshold reports

parameters.label: Temperature Threshold
parameters.overview: Threshold = (Value * 0.1) Scale is determined by Param64. 0 = disable.

parameters.label: Humidity Threshold
parameters.overview: Humidity range = 1% to 50%, 0 = disable.

parameters.label: Lux Threshold
parameters.overview: 0 = disable.

parameters.label: UV Threshold
parameters.overview: 0 = disable.

parameters.label: Threshold Check Time
parameters.overview:
Set threshold check time in seconds if threshold is enable via Parameter 40.

1~65535 - When USB powered

60~65535 - When Battery powered

parameters.label: Low Temperature Report
parameters.overview: Eable/Disable alarm report for low temperature(<= -15 C) Multilevel CC temperature report will be sent to gateway.

parameters.label: Sensor Limit Control
parameters.overview:
This value is bit mask. Used to enable/disable measurement reports for various sensors that is more than the upper

limit value or less than the lower limit value.

0 - Disabled

1 - Temperature upper level

2 - Humidity upper level

4 - Lux upper level

8 - UV upper level

16 - Temperature lower level

32 - Humidity lower level

64 - Lux lower level

128 - UV lower level

parameters.label: Temperature Upper Limit
parameters.overview:
Set upper limit level for temperature set in scale of 0.1. Scale is determined by Param64. If (Current measurement) >

(Upper Limit), then report sensor.

Value Range (EU/AU) : 400~1000

Value Range (US) : 400~21200

Default value (EU/AU) : 280

Default value (US) : 824

parameters.label: Temperature Lower Limit
parameters.overview:
Set lower limit level for temperature set in scale of 0.1. Scale is determined by Param64. If (Current Measurement) <

(Lower limit), then report sensor.

Value Range (EU/AU) : 400~1000

Value Range (US) :  400~2120

Default Value (EU/AU) : 0

Default Value (US) : 320

parameters.label: Temperature Recover Limit
parameters.overview:
Temperature recover limit set in scale of 0.1. Scale is determined by Param64. If (Current measurement) <= (upper

limit - recover limit), then temperature report. If (Current measurement) >= (lower limit + recover limit), then

temperature report.

parameters.label: Humidity Upper Limit
parameters.overview: Set humidity upper limit level.

parameters.label: Humidity Lower Limit
parameters.overview: Set humidity lower limit level.

parameters.label: Humidity Recover Limit
parameters.overview: Set humidity recover limit level. Refer to Param 51.

parameters.label: Lux Upper Limit
parameters.overview: Set lux upper limit level.

parameters.label: Lux Lower Limit
parameters.overview: Set lux lower limit level.

parameters.label: Lux Recover Limit
parameters.overview: Set lux recover limit level. Refer to Parameter  51.

parameters.label: UV Upper Limit
parameters.overview: Set UV upper limit level.

parameters.label: UV Lower Limit
parameters.overview: Set UV lower limit level.

parameters.label: UV Recover Limit
parameters.overview: Set UV recover limit level. Refer to Parameter 51.

parameters.label: Out-of-limit State
parameters.overview:
This is read only and bit mask. Out of the limit state of sensors.

Bit Mask:

0 - within limit

1 - out of limit

Value:

1 - Temperature upper level

2 - Humidity upper level

4 - Lux upper level

8 - UV upper level

16 - Temperature lower level

32 - Humidity lower level

64 - Lux lower level

128 - UV lower level

parameters.label: Temperature Scale
parameters.overview:
Set the scale for temperature when reports.

0 - Celsius

1 - Fahrenheit

Default Value (EU/AU) : 0

Default Value (US) : 1

parameters.label: LED Activity
parameters.overview:
Allow user to enable/disable LED activity of specific reports sent by sensor. Button press indicator is not affected by this.

0 - disable

1 - enable

parameters.label: Motion Sensor Report Indicator
parameters.overview: If LED is enabled by Param81, allow user to change the report color of motion sensor.

parameters.label: Temperature Sensor Report Indicator
parameters.overview: If LED is enabled by Parameter 81, allow user to change the report color of temperature sensor.

parameters.label: Humidity Sensor Report Indicator
parameters.overview: If LED is enabled by Param81, allow user to change the report color of humidity sensor.

parameters.label: Lux Sensor Report Indicator
parameters.overview: If LED is enabled by Param81, allow user to change the report color of Lux sensor.

parameters.label: UV Sensor Report Indicator
parameters.overview: If LED is enabled by Param81, allow user to change the report color of UV sensor.

parameters.label: Vibration Sensor Report Indicator
parameters.overview: If LED is enabled by Param81, allow user to change the report color of vibration sensor.

parameters.label: Battery Report Indicator
parameters.overview: If LED is enabled by Param81, allow user to change the report color of battery.

parameters.label: Wakeup Report Indicator
parameters.overview: If LED is enabled by Parameter 81, allow user to change the report color of wakeup.

parameters.label: Communication Indicator
parameters.overview: If LED is enabled by Parameter 81, allow user to change indicator color when receiving communication from gateway or other devices.

parameters.label: Automatic Report Checklist 1
parameters.overview:
Checklist 1 for automatic timed report. When the corresponding item is selected, it will be checked when timeout setting by Parameter 111.

0 - Disabled

1 - Battery

16 - UV

32 - Temperature

64 - Humidity

128 - Lux

Default 241 = 1 + 16 + 32 + 64 + 128, means all enable.

parameters.label: Automatic Report Checklist 2
parameters.overview:
Checklist 2 for automatic timed report. When the corresponding item is selected, it will be checked when timeout setting by Parameter 112.

0 - Disabled

1 - Battery

16 - UV

32 - Temperature

64 - Humidity

128 - Lux

Max value 241 = 1 + 16 + 32 + 64 + 128, means all enable.

parameters.label: Automatic Report Checklist 3
parameters.overview:
Checklist 3 for automatic timed report. When the corresponding item is selected, it will be checked when timeout setting by Parameter 113.

0 - Disabled

1 - Battery

16 - UV

32 - Temperature

64 - Humidity

128 - Lux

Max value 241 = 1 + 16 + 32 + 64 + 128, means all enable.

parameters.label: Automatic Checklist 1 Interval Time
parameters.overview: Interval time set in seconds to check the checklist1’s items. Multilevel Sensor Report will be sent when timeout.

parameters.label: Automatic Checklist 2 Interval Time
parameters.overview: Interval time set in seconds to check the checklist2’s items. Multilevel Sensor Report will be sent when timeout.

parameters.label: Automatic Checklist 3 Interval Time
parameters.overview: Interval time set in seconds to check the checklist3’s items. Multilevel Sensor Report will be sent when timeout.

parameters.label: Temperature Offset Value
parameters.overview:
Can add or minus this setting value to calibrate temperature when checked. Scale is defined by Param64. e.g. Value

15 means 1.5C or 1.5F.

parameters.label: Humidity Offset Value
parameters.overview: Can add or minus this setting value to calibrate humidity when checked. Unit: %.

parameters.label: Lux Offset Value
parameters.overview: Can add or minus this setting value to calibrate Lux when checked.

parameters.label: UV Offset Value
parameters.overview: Can add or minus this setting value to calibrate UV when checked.
